title: TDP-7 | Move 5M $RETOKEN from REtokenDAO.eth (MetaMask) to safe-poly.REtokenDAO.eth (Gnosis Safe Polygon)
body:
# Overview
In our ongoing efforts to move towards the "Decentralized Infrastructure" that we are creating, I propose that we move 5M $RETOKEN from retokendao.eth (MetaMask account that @Yonks controls) to safe-poly.retokendao.eth (Gnosis Safe on Polygon <Matic>).

During this "transition phase" we can adopt working procedures to utilize the multi-sig capabilities (Best Practices is one of our "Founding Principles").

# Gnosis Safe Multi-Sig Treasury Wallet

## safe.REtokenDAO.eth (Ethereum)
```0x2452A5721DE3e43169c456E464774B68a3942480```

## safe-poly.REtokenDAO.eth
```0x0A2830525ea50d274e24D2911Cf514523dBE10d8```

## The Who | Overview
Our current multi-sig is our "@Core Team" (discord roll ... minus @$RET who was most recently added to "Core Team")

## "Owners"
* Ryan | 0x4698e888743aAc490486bD03F12685A7E6DE5EeF
* MrsYonks | 0x4C9598DFaCc61d5E26541ac27cC1cB0bc793c9Cb
* Yonks | 0xE1b1aEC67295E36803be239e55e0e3B67AF4fFB4
* Amy | 0xF777A76dA9BC45e04De48FB07164f52c64d56317
* Theresa | 0xc6cCcA85930C7A3CE7E0c559469466e7de905A1E

## Policies
- Any transaction requires the confirmation of: 3 out of 5 owners
- can be updated in the future
- expect that this will be a function of our forthcoming “Board of Stewards” (BoS)

# "Temp Check" Post on Discord
https://discord.com/channels/877883581903564860/889308941278912524/889309853921705984

# Vote
* Yes | Solid "Best Practice"
* No | Yonks should control 100%
author: 0xE1b1aEC67295E36803be239e55e0e3B67AF4fFB4
